targets.rawSql: SELECT date_trunc('day', created_at) AS time, COUNT(*) AS count FROM customers WHERE created_at >= now() - interval '30 days' GROUP BY time ORDER BY time;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS active_customers FROM customers WHERE updated_at >= now() - interval '30 days';
SELECT client, COUNT(*) AS count FROM customers WHERE created_at >= now() - interval '30 days' GROUP BY client ORDER BY count DESC;

SELECT c.name AS customer, COUNT(t.id) AS ticket_count FROM customers c LEFT JOIN tickets t ON c.id = t.customer_id WHERE c.created_at >= now() - interval '30 days' GROUP BY c.name ORDER BY ticket_count DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS with_wallet FROM customers WHERE wallet_address IS NOT NULL AND wallet_address <> '' AND created_at >= now() - interval '30 days';

SELECT name AS customer, ROUND(AVG((jsonb_array_elements_text(user_ratings))::numeric), 2) AS avg_rating FROM customers WHERE jsonb_array_length(user_ratings) > 0 AND created_at >= now() - interval '30 days' GROUP BY name ORDER BY avg_rating DESC LIMIT 10;
